footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Rosaria | Update Date: 08/04/2022 | Editor: Sew#2409

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Favonius Lance__ - Generates energy for the whole team in exchange for personal damage and less CRIT Rate share.

__Deathmatch__ - The high CRIT Rate substat will increase the CRIT Rate Rosaria gives from her Ascension 1 talent while also boosting her own personal damage.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear, Staff of Homa, The Catch

fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value: x4-noblesseoblige

fields.name: Second Best Artifact Set:
fields.value: x4-emblemofseveredfate

fields.name: Third Best Artifact Set:
fields.value: x2-noblesseoblige|x2-blizzardstrayer

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Energy Recharge |<goblet>  Cryo DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Energy Recharge|CRIT Rate|CRIT DMG|ATK%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Rites of Termination
**2)** Elemental Skill: Ravaging Confession
**3)** Normal Attack: Spear of the Church

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Rosaria | Update Date: 10/06/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: __R5 Wavebreaker's Fin__ Due it's high base atk and DMG% passive it becomes Rosaria's best freeze weapon at R5.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Staff of Homa, R1 Wavebreaker's fin, Primordial Winged Jade-spear, The Catch, Favonius Lance

fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value: x4-blizzardstrayer

fields.name: Second Best Artifact Set:
fields.value: x4-noblesseoblige

fields.name: Third Best Artifact Set:
fields.value: x4-emblemofseveredfate

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Rosaria | Update Date: 03/20/2023 | Editor: Sew#2409

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: __Staff of Scarlet Sands__ The weapons high amounts of Crit Rate and Elemental Mastery to Flat ATK conversion make it the best choice for Reverse Melt Rosaria who benefits from all 3 stats.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Staff of Homa, Deathmatch, R5 Wavebreaker's Fin, r5 Dragon's Bane, Primordial Jade Winged-Spear, R1 Wavebreaker's Fin, R1 Dragon's bane

fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value: x4-gildeddreams

fields.name: Second Best Artifact Set:
fields.value: x4-lavawalker

fields.name: Third Best Artifact Set:
fields.value: x2-noblesseoblige|x2-blizzardstrayer
